system.description: Effect: The user reduces their HP to 0 and gains @Affliction[fainted]. After the user gains @Affliction[fainted], the Target recovers all of its HP and PP, and is cured of all Status Conditions. If the user is an owned Pokemon and their Trainer has another Pokemon that is not @Affliction[fainted] in a Poke Ball, that Pokemon may be designated the target of this Attack.
